title: The Minute and a ½ Man

sources.title: The Minute and a ½ Man (1959)
sources.description: Bumbling Hector Heathcoat joins the Minute Men during the American Revolution and promptly gets everything fouled up, but he becomes a hero when the scares away the attacking British Redcoats. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-minute-and-a-%c2%bd-man-1959/

metadata.Plot: Bumbling Hector Heathcoat joins the Minute Men during the American Revolution and promptly gets everything fouled up, but he becomes a hero when the scares away the attacking British Redcoats.
